General.Name: Al Etihad Cooperative Insurance Co SJSC
General.Description: Al-Etihad Cooperative Insurance Company provides insurance services in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It offers property, motor, marine and marine cargo, medical and health, general accident and liability, casualty, engineering and construction, and other general insurance products and services. Al-Etihad Cooperative Insurance Company was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Khobar, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Al Abdulkarim Tower, Dhahran, Saudi Arabia, 34232-4233
